name: Spiky Race
description:
Start your engines! It’s time to play Spike Racing!

Traverse the racecourse as … you guessed it, a spikey ball! Find your way around the obstacles using your spikes to your advantage!

Swing on swings, roll over bridges, and jump to new heights in this epic new game.

Spiky Race features:
-Fun new gameplay
-Multiple Levels
-Colourful Artwork
